answers.answer: She has asked me to see her later this evening. She said its very high...Just wanted to know in the meantime..
Oh, well idk, but keep us updated.

question: I had my GCT 2 hours test at 21 weeks and it was normal i.e. 112. Later when I had my ultrasound my AFI was borderline high i.e. 18 and my doctor orderd anotehr GCT at 31 weeks and this time it is very high i.e. 2018 which is way above the normal range of <140. Does anyone know its implications for the baby and if anyone has had this probelm?
title: GCT- Diabetes
